tool.name: FILL IN LATER
tool.help:
usage: tb-profiler [-h] {profile,reprofile,reformat,load_library,update_tbdb,lineage,collate,test,version} ...
TBProfiler pipeline
positional arguments: {profile,reprofile,reformat,load_library,update_tbdb,lineage,collate,test,version} Task to perform profile Run whole pipeline reprofile Reformat json results into text or pdf reformat Reformat json results into text or pdf load_library Load new library update_tbdb Load new library lineage Profile only lineage collate Collate results form multiple samples together test Output program version and exit version Output program version and exit
optional arguments: -h, --help show this help message and exit
